column1:
Odeinoichus,"2016-07-31T22:30:02.313Z","Make a Wish in Heartlake City Park","

Set #30204 Wish Fountain: Friends Polybags never fail to impress, it’s just such a shame that getting them in Canada can be extremely difficult. Be that as it may here’s the pros and cons of this little set and whether or not you should track it down.

column2: Model of Fountain is extremely cute and impressive. Includes white pieces, some teal and heart shaped jewel in the centre of the hear design brick-built section.
Stephanie mini-doll is cute, includes a camera, a pair of orange skates (with a third extra) and fun hair piece with ponytail and sun visor.
Includes gold coins and silver five cent printed studs for making wishes.
Spare skate leaves you with an uneven number.
Could use more clear blue pieces for simulated water effects.

column1: I strongly recommend this set, it is a brilliant little set piece for the LEGO Friends Heartlake City, and includes a lot of charm and adorableness. Honestly the biggest complaint is the fountain seems slightly too small, if it were larger it would be even better, as is though it’s very well thought out and an excellent addition to the LEGO Friends Polybag line.
